fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Competition, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: All legislation and policy affecting Plant Protection Products.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Nefyto is member of the European Crop Protection Association, ECPA.
goals__remit:
Nefyto shall have as its objective the scientific study and analysis of all fields of interest to the crop protection industry in all its dimensions, in particular those of a technical, documentary, and institutional nature as well as promoting knowledge of this industry’s activities.  
 
Nefyto represents the Dutch Crop Protection Industry. Nefyto promotes knowledge and understanding of crop protection as part of sustainable production of healthy, affordable food and safe high quality ornamental products. Nefyto interacts with stakeholders and is open for dialogue. 
 
Nefyto together with its members shall develop and promote sustainable agriculture and stewardship initiatives, to fulfil the vision, values and priorities as set out in the Nefyto Product Stewardship Code http://www.nefyto.nl/Thema-s/Product-Stewardship
relevant_communication: Our relevant activities can be found on our website www.nefyto.nl
